steps: 1.Make the pancake batter by adding the ingredients and mixing them throughly.
2.Pour the batter(1/4 cup) on a medium heated nonstick cooking pan.
3.When the pancake loosens flip the other side to bake.
4.Stack 3-4 such pancakes one upon another and shower some honey(optional) or eat directly.

ingredients: 5.Spices(musturd and cumin seeds,ginger-garlic paste,turmeric,garam masala,chilli powder,chillies,kasuri methi)
steps: 1.Take about 1 cup of soaked dal with 2 and 1/2 cups of water into the pressure cooker.
2.Let it cook for 2 whistles on medium heat and then open the pressure cooker.
3.Heat 1 and 1/2 spoon of ghee in a pan.
4.1/2 teaspoon of cumin seeds and 1 broken dried red chilli.
4.Add 1/8 teespoon of hing and 1 curry leaf.
5.Add finely chopped onionds and 1-2 chopped green chilli.
6.Add ginger garlic paste and 1/2 cup of chopped tomatoes.
7.Saute until the tomatoes turn mushy and soft.
8.Add masalas 1/4 teaspoon turmaric,garam masala and chili powder.
9.Now add the cooked dal into the mixture.
10.Let it cook for 4-5 minutes.
1.You will need ½ cup each of onions and capsicum.cut them into big pieces.
2.You will need 1 tablespoon of crushed ginger-garlic paste.
3.Slice 200 to 250 grams block or paneer into cubes or squares and keep aside.
4.Put 200 grams hung curd in a bowl. With a whisk beat the curd lightly till smoothand add the spices powder.
5.Add ½ tablespoon lemon juice and salt and mustard oil.
6.Mix well then Add the onions, capsicum and paneer to the marinade.
7.Cover and keep the marinated paneer and veggies in the refrigerator for 2 hours or more.
8.Begin to thread the veggies and paneer alternately on bamboo skewers. and grill then at 230 to 240 degrees celsius for 15 to 20 minutes.
9.let them cool and then enjoy.
1.Peel the skin of banana and slice it into very thin slices.
2.place a kadai, pour enough coconut oil on high flame.
3.heat the coconut oil for 5 minutes, take a small piece of banana pour in to the oil.
4.check both the sides are well fried or not else.
5.deep fry and take out the chips.
6.season it with salt and enjoy.
